messages.title: Delivering for the Island
messages.content: Getting Brexit Done THE LOCAL CHOICE FOR MP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Bob was in the British Army - receiving a Military MBE - prior to becoming the Island's MP. He served in Afghanistan and Iraq, returning to the Island between tours. Bob was twice elected as an Isle of Wight councillor. He lives near Brighstone.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: CHAMPIONING THE ISLE OF WIGHT IN WESTMINSTER
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Bob is a passionate advocate for our Island, and he gets results. Working with others, he has secured £48m for the NHS and £26m for Island Line. Sandown School and Venture Quays have been saved. Bob will continue to deliver for the Island.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: PROTECTING OUR ISLAND & HOUSING FOR ISLANDERS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: As an Islander, Bob has campaigned to improve the Island Plan. He is working with the Council to protect green fields, reduce housing targets & push for greater local families. He will fight for greater environmental protections for the Island.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only a majority government can get on with the country's priorities.

issues.environment: Bob has campaigned to improve the Island Plan. He is working with the Council to protect green fields, reduce housing targets & push for greater local families. He will fight for greater environmental protections for the Island.
issues.health: Bob has secured £48m for the NHS.

politicalExperience.achievements: Elected as an Isle of Wight councillor.

politicalExperience.role: MP for the Isle of Wight
politicalExperience.achievements: Secured £48m for the NHS and £26m for Island Line, saved Sandown School and Venture Quays.

quotes.text: Better hospitals. Safer streets. Improved schools. LET'S GET ON WITH OUR PRIORITIES.
